changelog_en: New:
+ support for all x64 processors on Windows
+ support for all Linux systems with GLIBC 2.31+ (instead of 2.34+)
+ support for software rendering activation for systems without a performance GPU. Automatic activation if startup using a GPU fails
+ implementing an experimental renderer to speed up application performance, cover loading, and improve overall application responsiveness
+ moving all *Lib network catalogs to a hybrid parser system
+ support for authorization in the ReManga and ReNovels directories
+ added caching arguments to MPV to eliminate skipping video blocks while viewing HLS/Dash content
+ added ability to specify custom MPV player arguments
+ new algorithm for calculating the dominant color of content covers
+ added note that logging in via social networks in WebView may not work
+ handling of MPV download errors
+ localization
Changes:
~ improved detection of the installed version of MPV
~ temporary loss of support for WebP/Avif/Heic format images in all application except MangaReader
~ updating internal libraries
~ localization improvements
Fixes:
- ReManga hybrid parser fixed
- fixed authorization in Anime365 directory
- fixed authorization in Anime365 directory
- fixed authorization status display on buttons in Anime365 and VK directory settings
- fixed some bugs in WebView
- fixed video playback even after closing the Web Player
- fixed a bug while loading 7-Zip library
- fixed an error while loading settings of some parsers
- fixed incorrect display of the error List is empty in the list of episodes and chapters if the actual list is not empty
- fixed working of storage management functions in Settings > Storage
- fixed MangaReader control button settings not working
- fixed incorrect error handling in XRemoteüû©Discovery mechanism
- fixed an error in the occupied space information section if some application folders were deleted
- fixed error display during parsing of invalid BB-codes in Shikimori descriptions
- fixed content opening in browser in Desu directory
- fixed a bug while defining and setting the accent color of the content cover
- fixed displaying of some errors on macOS
